GSD.description:
phonet/pep: refuse to enable an unbound pipe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.295 by commit b10c7d745615a092a50c2e03ce70446d2bec2aca. For more details please see the references link.
